settings.text: Find answers to the most common questions about our handcrafted Jesmonite products, shipping, and policies. Can't find what you're looking for? Get in touch - we're here to help!

settings.heading: How long does shipping take?
settings.row_content:
Production Time: 5-7 working days (made to order)
UK Shipping:

  • Standard Delivery: 3-5 working days (£4.99)
  • Express Delivery: 1-2 working days (£9.99)
  • Free shipping on orders over £50

Total delivery time: 8-12 working days for standard delivery.

settings.heading: Do you offer custom orders?
settings.row_content:
Yes! We love creating bespoke pieces. We can customize:

  • Colours and colour combinations
  • Sizes (within reason)
  • Personalised engraving
  • Bulk orders for special events

Contact us with your requirements for a quote. Custom orders typically take 2-3 weeks to complete.

settings.heading: What is your returns policy?
settings.row_content:
Standard Items: 14-day return window from delivery date. Items must be unused and in original condition.

Custom/Personalised Items: Unfortunately, custom pieces cannot be returned unless faulty.

Damaged Items: Please contact us within 48 hours with photos - we'll arrange a replacement immediately.

Return shipping costs are covered by the customer unless the item is faulty.

settings.heading: How do I care for Jesmonite products?
settings.row_content:
Jesmonite is easy to care for with proper handling:

  • Cleaning: Use a damp cloth with mild soap, avoid harsh chemicals
  • Drying: Dry thoroughly after cleaning
  • Handling: Handle with care - Jesmonite can chip if dropped
  • Storage: Keep away from extreme temperatures

With proper care, your pieces will last for years!

settings.heading: Do you ship internationally?
settings.row_content:
Currently, we only ship within the UK. We're working on expanding internationally - follow us on social media for updates!

If you're outside the UK and would like to place an order, please contact us - we may be able to arrange special shipping for larger orders.

settings.heading: Do you offer wholesale pricing?
settings.row_content:
Yes! We work with retailers, interior designers, and businesses looking to stock our products.

Wholesale Requirements:

  • Minimum order quantities apply
  • Trade references required
  • Exclusive designs available

Contact us for our wholesale catalog and pricing information.

settings.heading: How sustainable are your products?
settings.row_content:
Sustainability is at the heart of what we do:

  • Jesmonite: Made from natural minerals with water-based resins
  • Packaging: Minimal, recyclable packaging materials
  • Production: Made to order to reduce waste
  • Local: Handcrafted in the UK to reduce shipping emissions

Every purchase supports sustainable, responsible craftsmanship.
